title: The Red Queen's Summons
description: Inside the bunker, an AI hologram identifying itself as the 'Red Queen Protocol' activates. It reveals that the Scourge is not an accident—it was a weaponized terraforming event controlled by an entity named OMNICRON.

turns.narrative: The Queen asks you to insert your weapon into the genetic-scanner. She needs a 'pure' human to bypass the lockdown.
turns.choice_a: Refuse and threaten to smash the terminal
turns.consequence_a: She sighs and spawns two massive Omnicron Sentinels to test your worthiness.
turns.consequence_b: She accepts your genetics. 'Subject confirmed. Lockdown lifted.'

turns.narrative: If you fought the Sentinels, they wield singularity weapons that pull you toward them.
turns.choice_a: Use the gravity pull to accelerate your own strike
turns.consequence_a: You use their momentum against them, cleaving one cleanly in half.
turns.choice_b: Anchor yourself to the floor and use ranged attacks
turns.consequence_b: A tedious battle of attrition, but you eventually destroy them from a safe distance.

verified_combat.description: You proved your worth to the Red Queen through violence.

verified_genetic.description: You bypassed the security via genetic verification.

conclusion: You proved your worth to the Red Queen through violence.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed with minor lasting consequences. The thread remains open.
